embed.author: Mangosteen Commands
embed.title: Mangosteen commands.
embed.description: Start commands With the prefix `>`. Arguments in square brackets `[]` are required, Arguments in round brackets `()` are optional. Curly Brackets `{}` Show the permissions needed to use the command. Bars `|` Show The Commands Alises

field.ft: `unedgy [text]` Cleanse The Edgy out of Text. `yeet (text)` Yeet yourself into a room. `f` Press `f` to pay respects.
